ygData.subject: DEX
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, kind of on topic, kind of off topic...But I ll word it as best I can for on-topic! :-) In what way does a high DEX help a Bard? I currently have something
ygData.messageBody:
OK, kind of on topic, kind of off topic...But I'll word it as best I can for
on-topic! :-)

In what way does a high DEX help a Bard?

I currently have something like a 125 or so in DEX...(Who me? Own DEX
boosting items? Naw.....) Actually, I dumped as many of my starting points
into DEX as I could, and then added 2 Cutthroat Rings, Snakeskin Gloves, and
a Dragoon Dirk....

What skills are made better by high DEX? Does this affect my AC any? (I
wondered if it did though, because I bought 2 Brass Earrings, rated at 2AC
each, and when I put them on, they actually gave me a total of 7AC
increase...)

I beleive that I read somewhere that Mana for Bard's is DEX/CHA based...Is
this correct?

Thanks,
Lueln
10th Rank
Solusek Ro
